name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jira Ninja: reducing your Jira click rate

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides quick links to project and admin areas.  This is aimed a user who are admin and access many different Jira projects.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Jira Ninja is aimed at admin and advanced users who need to move between multiple projects o a regular basis.  The extension was built due to a frustration of navigating around Jira.

The extension gets the current project, and the from this allows you to easily access issues, versions and settings (like people and workflow) of the project.

Your recently viewed projects are also saved so you get access them again quickly.

There is also an admin section that allows you to quick get to all filters, projects and people.

Key improvement: Link to BitBucket

Setup
The extension is only active for your Jira domain
After you have installed the extension,view the options page and set your Jira domain.
Once the Jira domain is set, the extension icon will only be active for that domain

Permissions
The extension does insert a small script onto pages under your Jira domain so that it can read values from the page, project name

Data Capture
The extension does use Google Analytics to track behaviour.  The data that is captured is limited.  It does not capture the Jira Cloud domain, project ID or project name.
